bioAsHtml: Oleg is a Java developer, Evangelist and RebelLabs editor at ZeroTurnaround, with a focus on Continuous Delivery and Devops. He also enjoys spending time using Clojure, Github and Google docs. He is currently studying for a PhD on dynamic system updates and process migration and is a part-time teacher at the University of Tartu. As a technical writer for RebelLabs, Oleg regularly provides content for blogs and popular reports. In his free time he plays chess at a semi-grandmaster level, loves puzzles and solving problems. He is a geek but loves to hang out with people.

acceptedTalks.title: Build it and they will come. But, will they really?
